title: Pipakistan Citizen Test
description: this is a test given to subjects after night raids to determine if they are an enemy of the revolution.

question 1.text: What do you think is the biggest threat to progress?

question 2.text: Do you believe in supreem leader Pipkin pippa?

question 3.text: Do you think violence is necissary to dismantle the western worlds encidious ideology?

answer 1.text: You will be detained and sent to be reeducated by the department of truth

answer 2.text: You are to be survalanced by the state untill you provide 5 years millitary service.
